title: Popularity of Fidel Castro in Cuba 2015
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 3 number of Responses.
The maximum Share of respondents 50.0 is found at Response Very/somewhat negative and the minimum is found at Don't know / no answer where Response is 6.0.
The highest Response Very/somewhat negative has 44.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Don't know / no answer.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
Response Very/somewhat negative has the highest Share of respondents and Don't know / no answer has the lowest Share of respondents.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 3 number of Responses.
The maximum Share of respondents 50.0 is found at Response Very/somewhat negative and the minimum is found at Don't know / no answer where Response is 6.0.
The highest Response Very/somewhat negative has 44.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Don't know / no answer.
max_summary: This bar chart has 3 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 50.0 is found at Response Very/somewhat negative and the minimum is found at Don't know / no answer where Response is 6.0.
Response Very/somewhat positive has the second highest value for Share of respondents.
The Share of respondents of Response Very/somewhat negative is 8.33% larger than the minimum value at Don't know / no answer.
The Response Very/somewhat negative tends to be 1.5 percent higher than average.
The Share of respondents is 100.0 if we add up values of all Responses.
